parameter.name: expirationPolicy
parameter.description: Configures the minimum amount of time that a dynamic configuration instance can remain idle before the runtime considers it eligible for expiration. This does not mean that the platform will expire the instance at the exact moment that it becomes eligible. The runtime will actually purge the instances when it sees it fit.

parameter.name: reconnection
parameter.description: When the application is deployed, a connectivity test is performed on all connectors. If set to true, deployment will fail if the test doesn't pass after exhausting the associated reconnection strategy

parameter.name: reconnection
parameter.description: When the application is deployed, a connectivity test is performed on all connectors. If set to true, deployment will fail if the test doesn't pass after exhausting the associated reconnection strategy

operation.name: addPermission
operation.description: Adds a permission to this message queue.

parameter.name: label
parameter.description: a name for this permission

parameter.name: accountIds
parameter.description: the AWS account ID's for the account to share this queue with

parameter.name: actions
parameter.description: a list to indicate how much to share (SendMessage, ReceiveMessage, ChangeMessageVisibility, DeleteMessage, GetQueueAttributes)

parameter.name: queueUrl
parameter.description: Permissions will be added to the queue represented by this URL.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: changeMessageVisibility
operation.description: Changes the visibility timeout of a specified message in a queue to a new value. The maximum allowed timeout value you can set the value to is 12 hours. This means you can't extend the timeout of a message in an existing queue to more than a total visibility timeout of 12 hours.

parameter.name: receiptHandle
parameter.description: The receipt handle associated with the message whose visibility timeout should be changed.

parameter.name: visibilityTimeout
parameter.description: The new value (in seconds - from 0 to 43200 - maximum 12 hours) for the message's visibility timeout.

parameter.name: queueUrl
parameter.description: The URL of the Amazon SQS queue to take action on.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: changeMessageVisibilityBatch
operation.description: Changes the visibility timeout of multiple messages. This is a batch version of ChangeMessageVisibility. The result of the action on each message is reported individually in the response. You can send up to 10 ChangeMessageVisibility requests with each ChangeMessageVisibilityBatch action.

parameter.name: receiptHandles
parameter.description: A list of receipt handles of the messages for which the visibility timeout must be changed.

parameter.name: queueUrl
parameter.description: The URL of the Amazon SQS queue to take action on.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: createQueue
operation.description: Creates a new queue, or returns the URL of an existing one.

parameter.name: queueName
parameter.description: The name for the queue to be created.

parameter.name: attributes
parameter.description: A map of attributes with their corresponding values. Valid Map Keys: Policy | VisibilityTimeout | MaximumMessageSize | MessageRetentionPeriod | ApproximateNumberOfMessages | ApproximateNumberOfMessagesNotVisible | CreatedTimestamp | LastModifiedTimestamp | QueueArn | ApproximateNumberOfMessagesDelayed | DelaySeconds | ReceiveMessageWaitTimeSeconds | RedrivePolicy

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: deleteMessage
operation.description: Deletes the message identified by message object on the queue this object represents.

parameter.name: receiptHandle
parameter.description: Receipt handle of the message to be deleted

parameter.name: queueUrl
parameter.description: The URL of the queue to delete messages from

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: deleteMessageBatch
operation.description: Deletes up to ten messages from the specified queue. This is a batch version of DeleteMessage.

parameter.name: entries
parameter.description: A list of receipt handles for the messages to be deleted.

parameter.name: queueUrl
parameter.description: The URL of the queue to delete messages as a batch from.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: deleteQueue
operation.description: Deletes the message queue represented by this object. Will delete non-empty queue.

parameter.name: queueUrl
parameter.description: The URL of the queue to delete.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

parameter.name: queueUrl
parameter.description: The URL of the Amazon SQS queue to take action on.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: getQueueUrl
operation.description: Returns the URL of an existing queue.

parameter.description: The name of the queue whose URL must be fetched.

parameter.name: queueOwnerAWSAccountId
parameter.description: The AWS account ID of the owner that created the queue.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy

operation.name: listDeadLetterSourceQueues
operation.description: Returns a list of your queues that have the RedrivePolicy queue attribute configured with a dead letter queue.

parameter.description: The queue URL of a dead letter queue.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: listQueues
operation.description: Returns a list of your queues. The maximum number of queues that can be returned is 1000.

parameter.name: queueNamePrefix
parameter.description: A string to use for filtering the list results. Only those queues whose name begins with the specified string are returned.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: purgeQueue
operation.description: Deletes the messages in a queue specified by the queue URL.

parameter.name: queueUrl
parameter.description: the queue URL where messages are to be fetched from.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: read
operation.description: Reads a number of messages from a queue.

parameter.name: queueUrl
parameter.description: The Queue URL.

parameter.name: maxNumberOfMessages

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: removePermission
operation.description: Removes a permission from this message queue.

parameter.name: queueUrl
parameter.description: Permissions will be deleted from the queue represented by this URL.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: sendMessage
operation.description: Sends a message to a specified queue. The message must be between 1 and 256K bytes long.

parameter.name: message
parameter.description: The message to send.

parameter.name: queueUrl
parameter.description: the queue where the message is to be sent.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: sendMessageBatch
operation.description: Delivers up to ten messages to the specified queue. This is a batch version of SendMessage

parameter.name: messages
parameter.description: A list of SendMessageBatchRequestEntry items.

parameter.name: queueUrl
parameter.description: the queue where the message is to be sent.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: setQueueAttributes
operation.description: Sets the value of one or more queue attributes. When you change a queue's attributes, the change can take up to 60 seconds for most of the attributes to propagate throughout the SQS system. Changes made to the MessageRetentionPeriod attribute can take up to 15 minutes.

parameter.name: attributes
parameter.description: A map of attributes to set.

parameter.name: queueUrl
parameter.description: The URL of the queue.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

parameter.name: redeliveryPolicy
parameter.description: Defines a policy for processing the redelivery of the same message

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors
